The Easiest Online Form Builder

At JotForm, we believe online forms should do more than gather data — they should also represent your business, improve your workflow, and increase your productivity. That’s why JotForm offers more features, templates, and integrations than any other online form builder. Whether you need to collect contact information, job applications, order details, legally binding signatures, feedback, or payments, JotForm enables you to create a powerful online form that meets all your needs. The best part? It’s completely free.

Install our Chrome extension to access the easiest online form builder in just one click.

★ Free
Receive 100 submissions per month and access all JotForm features for free. JotForm also offers the best prices on the market for paid plans with more monthly submissions.

★ Drag-and-Drop Form Builder
You won’t need any coding skills to use our Form Builder. Simply choose which form elements you’d like to add and drag them onto your form. 

★ 5,000+ Form Templates 
There’s no need to build your form from scratch. Choose from thousands of customizable templates for registration forms, application forms, order forms, contact forms, sign-up forms, surveys, and more.

★ Advanced Form Features
Set up forms to automatically create analytics reports, schedule calendar events, and send confirmation emails. Add conditions, calculations, and widgets to optimize your form. 

★ Powerful Integrations
Connect with hundreds of apps you already use to streamline your workflow. Integrate with CRM software, email marketing lists, cloud storage, and payment processors. 

★ Multiple Embed Options
Copy and paste our short embed code into your web page HTML, or publish your form directly onto third-party platforms, such as WordPress, Facebook, Blogger, Weebly, Squarespace, and Wix. 
 
★ Secure Data Collection
To ensure the privacy and security of your data, JotForm uses an encrypted 256-bit SSL connection. JotForm is PCI DSS Level 1 and GDPR compliant to protect personal information and cardholder data. JotForm offers HIPAA compliance to users with a Silver or Gold plan.

★ 24-7 Customer Support
Our friendly support team is always available to help with any issue you might encounter with JotForm. 

★ Trusted by 4 Million Users
Discover why millions of people worldwide depend on JotForm as their all-in-one data collection solution.


New to JotForm? Create an online form for free at https://www.jotform.com.
